title: Thrashing Doves - Bedrock Vice [FLAC+MP3] 1987
description:
Thrashing Doves - Bedrock Vice [FLAC+MP3](Big Papi) 

1987 A&M CD-5149

Source: CD + Fresh Cover Art Scan



By L. G. 
If you start with anything from the Doves (as they are now called) start here. I keep coming back to this one. Not so impressed with the newer stuff. Beautiful Imbalance, Matchstick Flotilla, Biba's Basement, and Jesus on the payroll are the main highlights. Had to get the CD after I liquidated my LPs. Beautiful Imbalance just popped into my head one day and I remembered how great that album was so I found the CD. Couldn't stop playing it. Check it out. Start here!
